title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5003.5 - Moneys paid pursuant to the excellence in teaching program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5003.5 - Moneys paid pursuant to the excellence in teaching program

State Regulations

All moneys paid to a member pursuant to the excellence in
teaching program as provided in subdivision 27 of section
3602
of the

Education Law, which are not paid as termination pay or otherwise in
anticipation of retirement shall be deemed regular compensation for purposes of
computing the member's final average salary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5003.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
